imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array

commonLabels.description: Labels to add to all deployed objects

commonAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to all deployed objects

extraDeploy.description: Array of extra objects to deploy with the release

enabled.description: Enable diagnostic mode (all probes will be disabled and the command will be overridden)

command.description: Command to override all containers in the deployment

args.description: Args to override all containers in the deployment

enabled.description: Enable ingress record generation for Kubeapps

apiVersion.description: Force Ingress API version (automatically detected if not set)

hostname.description: Default host for the ingress record

path.description: Default path for the ingress record

tls.description: Enable TLS configuration for the host defined at `ingress.hostname` parameter

selfSigned.description: Create a TLS secret for this ingress record using self-signed certificates generated by Helm

extraHosts.description: An array with additional hostname(s) to be covered with the ingress record

extraPaths.description: An array with additional arbitrary paths that may need to be added to the ingress under the main host

extraTls.description: TLS configuration for additional hostname(s) to be covered with this ingress record

ingressClassName.description: IngressClass that will be be used to implement the Ingress (Kubernetes 1.18+)

extraRules.description: Additional rules to be covered with this ingress record

enabled.description: Enable support for the Carvel (kapp-controller) packaging.

tag.description: NGINX image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: NGINX image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

proxypassAccessTokenAsBearer.description: Use access_token as the Bearer when talking to the k8s api server

proxypassExtraSetHeader.description: Set an additional proxy header for all requests proxied via NGINX

replicaCount.description: Number of frontend replicas to deploy

cpu.description: The CPU limits for the NGINX container

memory.description: The memory limits for the NGINX container

cpu.description: The requested CPU for the NGINX container

memory.description: The requested memory for the NGINX container

extraEnvVars.description: Array with extra environment variables to add to the NGINX container

extraEnvVarsCM.description: Name of existing ConfigMap containing extra env vars for the NGINX container

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Name of existing Secret containing extra env vars for the NGINX container

fsGroup.description: Set frontend pod's Security Context fsGroup

runAsUser.description: Set NGINX container's Security Context runAsUser

runAsNonRoot.description: Set NGINX container's Security Context runAsNonRoot

customLivenessProbe.description: Custom livenessProbe that overrides the default one

customReadinessProbe.description: Custom readinessProbe that overrides the default one

customStartupProbe.description: Custom startupProbe that overrides the default one

lifecycleHooks.description: Custom lifecycle hooks for frontend containers

command.description: Override default container command (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args (useful when using custom images)

podAffinityPreset.description: Pod affinity preset. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: Pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: Node affinity preset type. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: Node label key to match. Ignored if `affinity` is set

values.description: Node label values to match. Ignored if `affinity` is set

priorityClassName.description: Priority class name for frontend pods

schedulerName.description: Name of the k8s scheduler (other than default)

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for pod assignment

hostAliases.description: Custom host aliases for frontend pods

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes for frontend pods

extraVolumeMounts.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumeMounts for frontend container(s)

sidecars.description: Add additional sidecar containers to the frontend pod

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers to the frontend pods

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose (normally used with the `sidecar` value)

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for frontend service

sessionAffinity.description: Session Affinity for Kubernetes service, can be "None" or "ClientIP"

enabled.description: Specifies whether Kubeapps Dashboard should be deployed or not

tag.description: Dashboard image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Dashboard image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

customStyle.description: Custom CSS injected to the Dashboard to customize Kubeapps look and feel

customAppViews.description: Package names to signal a custom app view

customComponents.description: Custom Form components injected into the BasicDeploymentForm

remoteComponentsUrl.description: Remote URL that can be used to load custom components vs loading from the local filesystem

skipAvailablePackageDetails.description: Skip the package details view and go straight to the installation view of the latest version

customLocale.description: Custom translations injected to the Dashboard to customize the strings used in Kubeapps

defaultTheme.description: Default theme used in the Dashboard if the user has not selected any theme yet.

replicaCount.description: Number of Dashboard replicas to deploy

createNamespaceLabels.description: Labels added to newly created namespaces

extraEnvVars.description: Array with extra environment variables to add to the Dashboard container

cpu.description: The CPU limits for the Dashboard container

memory.description: The memory limits for the Dashboard container

memory.description: The requested memory for the Dashboard container

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created

name.description: Name of the service account to use. If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the fullname template.

enabled.description: Specifies whether Kubeapps should configure OAuth login/logout

tag.description: OAuth2 Proxy image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

external.description: Use an external Auth Proxy instead of deploying its own one

skipKubeappsLoginPage.description: Skip the Kubeapps login page when using OIDC and directly redirect to the IdP

cookieSecret.description: Secret used by oauth2-proxy to encrypt any credentials

existingOauth2Secret.description: Name of an existing secret containing the OAuth client secrets, it should contain the keys clientID, clientSecret, and cookieSecret

cookieRefresh.description: Duration after which to refresh the cookie
